document_data.mainbody: ''D&D Beyond''' is a companion application and toolset designed for use with the fifth edition of [[Dungeons & Dragons]].
document_data.Description:
The application allows players to browse digital versions of D&D source materials such as rulebooks and materials, as well as provides various tools assisting with the gameplay mechanics of [[Dungeons & Dragons]], including a character builder and sheet manager, combat tracker and virtual tabletop maps.

In addition to digitized versions of physical source media, some digital content pertaining to the [[Forgotten Realms]] has been released exclusively on the platform.
document_data.History: The service was originally released in 2017 by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curse_LLC Curse], as an alternative to the previously existing [[D&D Insider]] service created by [[Wizards of the Coast]]. In 2018 Curse had been acquired by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fandom_(website) Fandom]. Later in 2022 D&D Beyond was purchased by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hasbro Hasbro] (the parent company of WotC), and eventually became the official companion app for Dungeons & Dragons.
